    solve[[ (node black (v13 -> false) (node black (v11 -> true) (node red (v1 -> true) (node black (v0 -> true)  ) (node black (v10 -> true)  )) (node black (v12 -> true)  )) (node red (v6 -> false) (node black (v4 -> true) (node red (v2 -> false) (node black (v14 -> true)  ) (node black (v3 -> false)  )) (node black (v5 -> false)  )) (node black (v8 -> true) (node black (v7 -> true)  ) (node black (v9 -> true)  )))) ] 552]
